title: How come SG Syndra doesn't glow anymore when she recalls?
body:
How come you removed her glow in this patch while the rest are still able to do so?
Please don't tell me you guys did a Blood Moon Jhin where you removed it just because it was "pointless".

Here's the difference between the trailer and spotlight

https://i.gyazo.com/6f449dd202ff8c33907b9b707b1aa0de.jpg

https://i.gyazo.com/6646be4cea8ce1267ac40f2b8f67fe84.png

replies.body: Oh it is bug! Thank you so much!
I checked it in Invasion and she doesn't do that as well there, i'll take a screen shot of it as well
She does. It's just a bug on pbe that makes her not glow but I would love if she glows like this when she uses her ultimate. What a waste potential.
